title: Pillow 'Wheel'
description: Recently, funny pillows are often chosen for gifts, which stand out with unusual and funny inscriptions and drawings. Such a gift is able to cheer up not only the hero of the occasion, but the whole company, while the pillow will not be dusted, as is often the case with gifts, but will be in demand!

title: Thermal Mug 'Coat of Arms'
description: What for? Do not have time to notice how your tea has cooled down? The thermomug will keep warm and will help to notice only pleasure from a drink! When? Always, if you need a long time to enjoy hot coffee or tea, as well as to drink a cold cocktail in the summer heat. Where? On a table at a computer or a book, in a cup holder of a car, in a movie with popcorn, on a walk with a dog, on a street with a stroller, on a bicycle, skiing in the mountains, on a campfire trip, on a steam ..

title: Mask for a dream 'More UA'
description: A sleeping mask is worn on the head to cover the eyes to protect them from bright light during sleep, both in transport and at home. The mask can be worn to prevent eye opening. With open eyes, nothing is visible through the fabric.

title: Microfiber pent with menthol seals
description: Hiding in a microfiber blanket you will forever forget what cold feet or hands are. The blanket covers the whole body, it is two meters long, which allows an adult to take refuge. And of course, the highlight of the plaid is the sleeves. There will no longer be a need to reveal to switch the channel or answer the phone. You can do it all while remaining completely covered. It will also be convenient to take it to nature, wrap it in it, sitting in your favorite chair, on a balcony or terrace, use it in the car as a travel blanket.
